sentences: Vittorio Cosma (born 11 March 1965) is an Italian pianist, record producer, conductor, and arranger.
Born in Varese, Cosma studied piano at the Milan Conservatory and later jazz piano under Patrizio Fariselli and Franco D'Andrea.
His activities as composer, arranger, and producer began in the late 1980s for Eugenio Finardi's album Il vento di Elora.
In 2017 he recorded an album as a member of the supergroup Gizmodrome with Stewart Copeland, Adrian Belew, and Mark King.
